itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Farming product that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Special Dry Mane Grass Crate
item.desc: An herb that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.

item.name: Concentrated Herbal Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +175.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.

item.name: Herbal Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals MP/WP/SP by +125.\n- Cooldown: 6 sec\n- It weighs less than normal potion.
